The product does not comply with the Regulation on the approval and market surveillance of two- or three-wheel vehicles and quadricycles.

danger: An electrical overload in the 48Volt (V) electrical system may cause a failure of the Metal Oxide Semiconductor Field Effect Transistor (MOSFET). This may cause an electrical cascade failure, causing the DCDC convertor to experience an electrical short where the 12V circuit shorts to ground.    As a result, smoke from the DCDC converter can be vented into the passenger compartment, and where sufficient oxygen exists, a sustained vehicle fire may occur.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): ManufacturerCategory of measure(s): Recall of the product from end usersDate of entry into force: 06/11/2020

name: Passat, Golf
danger: Volkswagen has been informed by its current supplier that driver-airbag gas generators from the original manufacturer Takata (‘NADI’ (non-azide driver inflator) generators) produced during 1997-1999 may be faulty. VW used these gas generators exclusively in vehicles with a wooden steering-wheel rim (at that time an equipment option). Internal investigations have shown that in the event of an accident the restraining effect of the deployed NADI driver airbag might not always be fully guaranteed. Compliance with the statutory requirements in force for protection by an airbag in the event of an accident is thus not ensured.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): ManufacturerCategory of measure(s): Recall of the product from end usersDate of entry into force: Unknown
description: Vehicles equipped with Takata NADI (Non-Azide Driver Inflator) airbag inflator.

name: 3er
production_dates: The affected vehicles were manufactured between 3 June 1997 and 30 June 2000
danger: The vehicles affected may have been fitted with Takata non-azide driver inflator (NADI) gas generators in which inadequate sealing on the gas generator could allow the ingress of moisture and thus result in the degradation of the propellant. If the airbag deploys, this could cause the gas generator to underinflate or to burst. In the case of under inflation the protective effect is not given. In case of overpressure deployment metal parts can enter the vehicle interior, this could cause serious or fatal injuries to occupants of the vehicle.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): ManufacturerCategory of measure(s): Recall of the product from end usersDate of entry into force: Unknown

danger: Potential leakage of battery acid around the battery negative terminal could cause the battery monitoring sensor to fail. Over time growth of copper sulphate may accumulate. This, in turn, could provide a conductive layer underneath the Battery Monitoring Sensor, creating a low resistance to ground. The increased current flow, due to low resistance, could cause the surrounding material to heat up to a point where it ignites, resulting in a fire.

danger: The engine wire harness has a cover attached where it is connected to the hybrid vehicle Power Control Unit. Due to assembly variation, a portion of the wire harness could contact the cover. If dust has accumulated on the wire harness or the cover, vibration during vehicle use may cause the insulation on the wires to wear over time and expose the core wire, causing an electrical short circuit to occur between the damaged wires and generate heat. If sufficient heat is generated, there is an increased risk of fire.

name: Leaf

danger: null A fail-safe clip fitted to the steering column to ensure correct fitment of the steering column lower joint may have been dislodged from the part during the vehicle assembly process. Without this fail-safe clip, the bolt to secure the joint may be fixed without the steering column shaft being fully inserted on to the steering gear input shaft. Although the length of engagement is sufficient for the steering system to work normally, the forces on the joint (specifically during low speed manoeuvring) may with time cause the joint to work loose and disconnect from the steering system leading to a loss of steering control.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Recall of the product from end usersDate of entry into force: Unknown

danger: null Under certain conditions there is a risk that the ignition switch in the vehicles may move out of the “run” position, resulting in a partial loss of electrical power and turning off the engine. This risk may increase if the key ring is carrying added weight (such as more keys or the key fob) or the vehicle experiences rough road conditions or other jarring or impact related events. When the ignition switch is not in the run position, the air bags may not deploy if the vehicle is involved in a crash, increasing the risk of injury or fatality.  Some vehicles may also have a condition in which the ignition key may be removed when the ignition is not in the “Off” position. In such an event, unintended vehicle motion may occur, resulting in a vehicle crash and occupant or pedestrian injuries.

name: Corolla, Corolla Matrix, Voltz

danger: null The front airbags and/or the pyrotechnic seat-belt tensioner units can loosen unintentionally. The airbag control device was manufactured using application-specific integrated circuits (ASIC), which are susceptible to internal short circuits. If the control device is subjected to strong inductive electrical noise – caused by other electrical components in the vehicle - this can result in an internal short circuit. Abnormal current flow can arise in the airbag control device, causing the interior temperature to increase, potentially damaging the ASIC.

measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown

model: Vehicle type 169, EC type approval e3*2001/116*0151*
danger: The product poses a risk of injuries because in the affected vehicles, the rear seat belt locks can open inadvertently. If this should happen, the seat belts would no longer serve their purpose and the passengers would no longer be restrained
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: The vehicles affected are those manufactured from January to February 2008 with the following vehicle identification numbers:ZFA16900001097387 – ZFA16900001103182

model: ESPACE IV, VEL SATIS and LAGUNA II models equipped with ESP
danger: The product poses a risk of injuries because there is a possibility of partial loss of the ABS functions after 3 to 5 seconds of setting due to an internal leak from the ESP isolation solenoid valve. This could result in partial and temporary loss of directional control of the vehicle and the ESP (electronic stability) function if braking is accompanied by activation of the ABS (wheel anti-blocking system). The ESP function sets the ABS to ensure the functioning of the wheel(s) which corrects the vehicle's trajectory. Functioning returns to normal when the brake pedal is released after braking. The conventional braking function (i.e. with no activation of the ABS) is not affected.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: VEL SATIS and ESPACE IV models equipped with ESP manufactured between 31 August 2007 and 15 September 2007, and LAGUNA II, VEL SATIS and ESPACE IV models equipped with ESP repaired with a replacement hydraulic block between 7 August 2007 and 12 December 2007. All of these vehicles having been manufactured in Sandouville (France).

danger: The product poses a risk of fire as transition resistance may be unacceptably high in the earth connection of the heating element of the additional air heater. This may cause overheating in this cable's connection area, damage resulting from excessive temperatures and, in the worst case scenario, it could set the vehicle on fire.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: There are 4 885 vehicles affected on the Spanish market, manufactured between 8 January 2007 and 9 January 2008 with the following chassis numbers:WVW ___ 1K _ 7 M 099441 - 202689WVW ___ 1K _ 8 M 000025 - 1119033VW ___ 1K _ 7 M 101615 - 2026853VW ___ 1K _ 8 M 000033 - 105765WVW ___ 1K _ 7 M 300066 – 307813WVW ___ 1K _ 8 M 300001 – 3604143VW ___ 1K _ 7 M 300151 – 3031163VW ___ 1K _ 8 M 300043 – 321362

danger: The product poses a risk of injuries because the power steering hose may get in conflict with the engine cooling fan. This concern is due to an insufficient retaining clip. The insufficient basic design regarding fixation of the power steering hose enables it to come in direct contact with the rotating fan. The subsequent chafing on the hose will result in a sudden drainage of servo oil in the system and a loss of servo assistance. Since this will appear suddenly and without any relevant warnings to the driver, combined with the type of vehicle concerned, this condition poses an unreasonable risk to motor vehicle safety.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importerDate of entry into force: Unknown
description: The recall concerns 2007 and 2008 model year vehicles.

model: Passengers’ cars, model Freelander 2/LR2 (program number P009).
danger: The product poses a risk of injuries due to possible loss of the glass panel of the sunroof.Failure of either the left-side or right-side sunroof guide rail could cause the sunroof to become detached from its operating mechanism and bind. There might be a cracking noise if this condition occurs. If it does occur, the sunroof glass panel will remain attached to its frame, but further attempts to operate it will result in continued noise and abnormal operation due to the binding condition. If a vertical force is applied (for example, if the user is manually aiding the sunroof to close, or wind lift) the glass panel can become fully detached from the vehicle.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the manufacturerDate of entry into force: Unknown
description: The recall concerns 2007 and 2008 model year vehicles, with VINs from Η000201 to Η087347.

model: Mitsubishi Space Wagon, Mitsubishi Space Runner.
danger: The product poses a risk of injuries because the front left inner brake hydraulic line can be damaged by the hose from the servo-assisted steering and the effectiveness of the brakes will be reduced.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown

danger: The product poses a risk of injuries because the parking brake cable in the vehicles is not according to the specification. When the parking brake is activated there is a risk of deformation of the cables. In this situation the effectiveness of the parking brake could be reduced or lost. The vehicle may start rolling and possibly hit a pedestrian causing personal injury.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the manufacturer.Date of entry into force: Unknown

model: Passenger car, models 911 (997) GT3 and 911 GT3 RS
danger: The product poses a risk of injuries because a result of a defective control console, the Traction Control function regulating drive forces on the rear axle or the PASM system providing the sports control of damper forces may malfunction and fail to operate, leading to possible loss of control of vehicle.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: The recall concerns cars built between 28 September and 9 November 2007.

danger: The product poses a risk of injuries because under certain operating conditions, when starting the engine, the climate control functions may not work as intended, e.g. the defroster function may not be available. This may reduce the sight ability for the driver and become a reason for a road accident.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the manufacturer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: The recall concerns 2007 and 2008 model year VOLVO XC90 vehicles.

danger: The driver’s seat is equipped with a main seatbelt pretensioner and an additional pretensioner where the seatbelt is fastened. During an accident, the pretensioner of the final fitting is activated shortly after activation of the main pretensioner. In some isolated cases, this impulse may cause the buckle of the seatbelt to open unnecessarily. If this happens, the restraining action of the three-point safety belt is lost.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importerDate of entry into force: Unknown

model: clesProduct: Passenger carBrand: MAZDAAffected models are: Mazda 3 and Mazda 5 with MZR-CD engine, as well as Mazda 3MPS
danger: The product poses a risk of injuries because if sudden/rapid acceleration is repeatedly performed, the No 4 engine mount bolt may loosen and fall out or break, allowing the transmission to be out of position. In extreme cases, the driveshaft may become detached. If this occurs the vehicle will immediately lose power, come to a stop and be inoperable.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the importerDate of entry into force: Unknown
description: - Mazda 3 models manufactured in Japan between 26 December 2006 and 6 September 2007.  The chassis numbers are:JMZ BK14R6 01 585490 – 670599JMZ BK1*R6 71 584967 – 595701JMZ BK1*R6 81 595713 – 670819- Mazda 5 models manufactured in Japan between 19 April 2005 and 3 September 2007.  The chassis numbers are:JMZ CR19*6 00 109114 – 229816JMZ CR19*6 60 106040 – 137204JMZ CR19*6 70 137205 – 200006JMZ CR19*6 80 200008 – 229845

danger: In some of Jaguar vehicles there is a possibility of the ignition in the exhaust system because of the excessive rise of temperature of the cover of solid particles filter.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importerDate of entry into force: Unknown
description: Jaguar S-Type and HJ (Diesel). Models affected were manufactured in 2004-2007 in United Kingdom.

model: Clio III and Modus. The defect pertains to Renault Clio III cars manufactured in the period from 13 December 2005 to 23 January 2006 in the Flins factory (France) and from 23 January 2006 to 8 February 2006 in Bursa factory (Turkey) as well as to Renault Modus cars manufactured in the period from 14 December 2005 to 16 February 2006 in Valladolid (Spain). The VIN numbers of the Clio III cars start with VF1BR1 or VF1CR1 and of the Modus cars with VF1JP0.
danger: The product poses a risk of injuries because due to the possibility of stop lights switch melting, the lights can cease to function properly and additionally the temperature near the set of pedals can increase significantly leading to the production of smoke inside the car.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the importerDate of entry into force: Unknown

model: 1) MEGANE II with DPO automatic gearbox, 2) CLIO III with DPO automatic gearbox
danger: Fault in programming of the automatic gearbox. Some faulty processor functions can cause spurious operation of dashboard warning lights and poor operation of the automatic gear change.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importerDate of entry into force: Unknown
description: 1) manufactured between 7 March 2006 and 29 May 20062) manufactured between 10 November 2005 and 29 May 2006

model: Audi A3 (8P) 2.0 TDI with 6 SP Gearbox
danger: The dual mass flywheel may become damaged due to the configuration of the restrictor passage in the bleeder valve in the hydraulic pressure line for clutch actuation. This can happen if the clutch is engaged very abruptly, for instance if the pedal is allowed to spring back by itself. After causing unusual mechanical noises, the dual-mass flywheel will eventually fail completely. In unfavourable conditions this can lead to a fire in the vehicle.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the importerDate of entry into force: Unknown

model: CORSA D MY 2007 with VIN numbers from 74000001 to 74186810 (factory: Zaragoza Spain) and from 76000001 to 76068172 (factory: Eisenach Germany)
danger: The product poses a serious risk of injuries because the front low arm of the suspension might present cracks at the joining points with the silent-blocks. This deviation from the manufacturers’ specifications can lead to a reduction of the stability levels of the vehicle, causing the driver to lose the ability to direct the car properly or in the worst case to loose the control of the vehicle.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.  Press release has been issued.Date of entry into force: Unknown

danger: There is a possibility of failure of front suspension cross-member, which may result in a possible damage of this specific part. If this occurs, the normal driving behaviour of the car will be affected, leading to possible loss of control of vehicle.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the importerDate of entry into force: Unknown

name: FIAT Stilo passenger car
danger: The product poses a risk of accident and injury because the front axle springs can break, come in contact with and damage the tyres. Road salt deposits on the spring plate can cause severe corrosion and fracture the spring. The broken spring may touch the tyres and damage them.Some cases of damage to the vehicle have been reported.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the producer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Type approval e3*98/14*0089*.Description: The vehicles concerned are those of the model years 2001 to 2006.

danger: The Electronic Power Steering (EPS) control unit can, in some cases, switch to fail safe mode while driving due to detection of abnormal current within the EPS control unit. If this occurs, there will be a sudden loss of power assistance and the driver will notice that the steering becomes very heavy without warning. The sudden loss of power assistance could lead to an accident and injury.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Electronic Power Steering (EPS) control unit in Honda carsDescription: The recall concerns the following vehicles: 2006 Civic 5 Door (SHHFK1***6U000101~SHHFK1***6U003998; SHHFK2***6U000101 ~ SHHFK2***6U009998; SHHFK3***6U000101~ SHHFK3***6U009351) manufactured between 13 September 2005 and 22 February 2006 and 2006 Civic 4 Door (JHMFD1***6S200022~ JHMFD1***6S205130; JHMFD3***6S200009 ~ JHMFD3***6S200874) manufactured between 1 September 2005 and 26 January 2006.

model: Megane II 5 door, Megane II Convertible, Scenic II
danger: A deformation of front seatbacks of the two front seats may occur in the affected vehicles and this deformation could possibly affect the stability of the seatback in a case of an accident and result in injury.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Seatback Frames in Renault carsThe recall concerns vehicles produced between 1 and 30 of September 2003 for Megane II Convertible, between 1 September and 31 October 2003 for Megane II 5door and between 1 August 2003 and 31 October 2003 for Scenic II.

model: Grand Cherokee WG, Grand Cherokee WJ
danger: The product poses a risk of fire because the front seat electric heating elements may overheat and cause an interior fire.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Heated Seat Elements in Jeep carsThe recall concerns vehicles equipped with heated front seats built after 10 September 2002 for the WJ and after 24 January 2003 for the WG. The VIN/chassis numbers are: 1J8G2@8#?&Y* where @ = E or B, # = A or J or S, ? = 1 to 9 or X, & = 3 or 4  and * = production numbers of 6-digits.

name: Fuel Feeding Pump in Chevrolet cars
danger: One incident, during the NCAP (New Car Assessment Program) test.On some AVEO vehicles, fuel feed tubes and fuse blocks may fracture during a severe frontal crash event what may cause fuel pump to continue to operate after the crash.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: The recall concerns vehicles produced from June 2005 to 27 September 2006.

name: Intercooler outlet pipe in Suzuki Grand Vitara Turbodiesel 1.9
danger: Due to the improper design of the intercooler outlet pipe and insufficient tightening of the intercooler inlet hose clump, they could slip off and cause the improper ratio of air/fuel mixture.The above condition may cause excessive deposition of carbon particulate in DPF (Diesel Particulate Filter) system that could burn up and result in the overheating or melting of DPF. In the worst case, DPF may catch fire.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: The recall concerns vehicles with chassis numbers from JSAJTA44V00107438 to JSAJTA44V00201289 (3D) and from JSAJTD44V00106868 to JSAJTD44V00205350 (5D).

name: “Audi”, model A8
danger: In the event of a crash, it is possible that the air bag on the driver’s side will not inflate properly posing a risk of injury.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the producer. Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Vehicle type 4E, EC type approval e1 * 2001/116 * 0198 * 00-17. Vehicle identification numbers in the following ranges: WAU _ _ _ 4E _ 3N 000 101 to WAU _ _ _ 4E _ 3N 009 865; WAU _ _ _ 4E _ 4N 000 101 to WAU _ _ _ 4E _ 4N 026 468; WAU _ _ _ 4E _ 5N 000 101 to WAU _ _ _ 4E _ 5N 017 208.Date of production: between July 2002 and March 2004.

name: Nissan Note
danger: The car poses a risk of accident due to a failure of the rear ISOFIX bracket under extreme conditions.Under extreme stress, such from a side impact, the rear ISOFIX bracket may break, thus rendering a child restraint system installed using the ISOFIX system useless.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the producer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Description: 2006-model vehicles are affected. VIN areas concerned:SJNF*AE11U1001137 toSJNF*AE11U1003985.

danger: Due to a defective weld, the tie-rod assembly for the rear-wheel suspension may break, resulting in loss of control of the vehicle and risk of an accident and injury.A weld on the tie-rod assembly for the right rear-wheel suspension does not meet the specification. The assembly could therefore break at this point, with the result that the right rear wheel would no longer be steered correctly and the driver would loose the control of the vehicle.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the producer.Date of entry into force: Unknown

name: Smart fortwo
danger: The car poses a risk of injury because due to an assembly fault, the seatbelt receivers and seats in some vehicles may not have been screwed in correctly, and the belt receivers and seats may not therefore withstand the resulting stresses.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the producer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Description: VIN areas concerned: WME4503321J256906 - WME4503321J289003. World-wide 5 734 vehicles of the 2006 model are affected.

danger: It is possible that the power steering oil pump pulley fixing nut may be loosened or the pulley may crack due to insufficient tightening torque of the fixing nut and insufficient strength of pulley. If the vehicle continues to be used under such conditions, the pulley may be broken or come off, allowing the steering effort to increase. This can lead to the loss of control of vehicle.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer and information to consumers.Date of entry into force: Unknown

name: Audi A3
danger: The gas required to inflate the curtain airbag can escape gradually through a defective weld seam on the gas generator. In this case the curtain airbag would fail to inflate in a collision.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the manufacturer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: The affected vehicles were manufactured during the period 06.2005 - 08.2005 and have a vehicle identification number within the following range:WAU _ _ _ 8P _ 6A 023 747to WAU _ _ _ 8P _ 6A 061 475.

name: BMW Series 5, 6, 7
danger: In some of the above-mentioned vehicles, the vulcanised connection of the lower rubber mount to the metal sleeve of the rear damper may possibly be insufficient. This can lead to the rubber mount becoming separated from the damper, causing lose of control of the vehicle.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Description: BMW passenger vehicles with production period from 09.01.2006 to 26.04.2006.

name: Alfa Romeo
danger: In some of the above-mentioned vehicles, the VDC System cannot recognize the spare wheel, due to its different size from the normal wheels. As a result the ABS does not function in a case of accident.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken  by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Type/model: Alfa Romeo GT and 147 cars equipped with VDC (Vehicle Dynamic Control System), without engine 3.2 Petrol.The chassis numbers:- for Alfa Romeo GT, from 3144007 to 3321295 and from 5081439 to 5210113 (produced from November 2003 to December 2005); - for Alfa Romeo 147, from 3228724 to 3328468 and from 5144149 to 5216111 (produced from June 2004 to January 2006).

name: Toyota Yaris, Yaris Verso, Prius
danger: Due to loss of control of the vehicle, the product poses a risk of accident. Given the improper moulding of the resin body of the crankshaft position sensor installed on the engine block, engine oil may penetrate the seal and enter the sensor wiring connector. In this condition, engine oil inside the sensor wiring connector could cause expansion due to the heat of the engine and could deform the sensor wiring connector. In the worst case, the connector may become disconnected, which could cause the engine to stall while driving and not be able to be restarted.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Affected range produced between 31 January 2001 and 29 October  2001 (Yaris), 8 October 2001 (Yaris Verso) or 8 November 2001 (Prius).

name: Toyota Land Cruiser 120
danger: After the original brake fluid in the vehicle in question is replaced, the rear seal of the main brake pump can shift, leading to a small leakage of fluid. If the leak persists, the brake pedal may feel spongy when pressed and the brake indicator light will come on.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown

name: MERCEDES BENZ
danger: In some model SLR MACLAREN vehicles, the design and construction of the alternator and its insufficient cooling, can cause it to reach temperatures outside the specified range. As a consequence the alternator may overheat and, in individual cases, produce smoke and flames.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the distributor.Date of entry into force: Unknown

name: Toyota Corolla Verso
danger: These cars pose a risk of injuries.Due to incorrect programming of the electronic control unit (ECU), the seat-belt pre-tensioner for the right side of vehicle is disabled instead of the passenger’s airbag in the affected vehicles when the “airbag manual on-off system” is turned off. This poses a risk of injuries for the co-passenger due to non-function of the seat-belt pre-tensioner.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown

model: DISCOVERY 3, RANGE ROVER, RANGE ROVER SPORT
danger: The gearbox may fail to lock when the gearshift lever is put into the parking position “P”, which could lead to the vehicle moving if the handbrake is not activated.In the case of the Discovery 3, in addition to this defect, the vehicle is equipped with xenon headlights without the system of automatic dynamic height control that is required by law.The rolling away of the vehicle when in the parking position may lead to collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians and cause traffic accidents. The lack of automatic dynamic height control for the xenon headlights of the Discovery 3 could reduce visibility for the driver or blind other vehicles, thereby increasing the risk of accidents.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown

danger: When the vehicle is used continually and the seal breaks, losing its ability to lubricate, the front-suspension lower ball joint may wear over time and possibly fracture in the strut area. In the worst case, the front-suspension lower control arm may become loose, making steering more difficult.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer. Date of entry into force: Unknown

name: Chevrolet Nexia and Espero
model: Espero serial numbers 102171 to 990453 inclusive, Nexia serial numbers 000001 to 793829 inclusive
danger: It is possible that the buckles of the front seatbelts may not close properly, owing to a design fault in one of the components inside the buckle. This means that the retention mechanism of the front seatbelt buckle may not work properly.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown

name: Toyota Lexus
danger: In the notified vehicles a small loss of brake fluid from the back of the brake cylinder may occur.  If the leak continues, the warning light on the dashboard will illuminate and the brake pedal will feel spongy when depressed.  However, an accident could result from the loss of brake fluid, irrespectively of whether or not the driver had been warned by the dashboard light.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Produced between February 2003 and December 2004.Description: In Europe, only the RX 300 model has been sold. The chassis numbers of the vehicles concerned lie in the range between JTJHF31U#00001046 and JTJHF31U#02003018 (the # symbol stands for any digit between zero and nine).

danger: The outer ball joint stud on the steering gear may fracture. As a result, the driver may notice difficulty in handling manoeuvres which may cause an accident due to insufficient control of the car. The problem may appear after using the car under extreme driving conditions and intense strain of the direction system (off road driving or driving on a bumpy road). 80 accidents have been reported worldwide.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective actions taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: The recall concerns vehicles produced in 2003-2006, with chassis numbers ending from 0000001 to 0273555.

name: Opel Vectra and Signum
danger: Moisture ingress to the heatable spray nozzles can trigger a malfunction, which can result in the spray nozzles overheating. In unfavourable circumstances, overheating of the spray nozzles can lead to a fire in the engine compartment shortly after the engine has been stopped. Some fire damages have been reported without any injury to persons.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary worldwide corrective actions taken by the producer.Date of entry into force: Unknown

name: GM Daewoo Auto & Technology Company/Korea
danger: If the passenger airbag is activated, the gas generator can become detached from the housing, leading to an increased risk of injury.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the producer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Sales designation Matiz or M100/M200 or Zitto or d’Arts or Spark; Vehicle type Klya, EU type approval e4*2001/116*0028.Description: The recall concerns vehicles built in 2005 with vehicle identification numbers 5C041024 to 5C078655.

danger: Sunroof glass may detach from frame while driving and cause an accident to the nearby coming vehicles.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the importer.Date of entry into force: Unknown

model: Sales designation R350; type 251 (R350), EU type approval e1*2001/116*0341
danger: The fitting position of the starter lead assembly is not as specified. In the case of damage to the assembly, which is encased in a corrugated tube, an acute voltage loss may occur, leading to failure of the entire electrical system.
measures: Type of economic operator taking notified measure(s): OtherCategory of measure(s): Voluntary corrective action taken by the producer.Date of entry into force: Unknown
description: Description: The recall concerns vehicles built between 08.2005 and 02.2006, vehicle identification numbers A000659 to A014575.
